pages.text: A Rowan Door is not too dissimilar from a mundane wooden door, but hides a couple unique properties.

Each time the door is placed, a $(item)Rowan Key$() will be produced. The Door will then only open if the creature is holding the right key. A $(item)Redstone Signal$() will only ever close the door, never open it.
Multiple $(item)Rowan Keys$() can be combined together into a $(item)Rowan Keyring$(), that just stores all the key into a single item and will open all the doors the keyring has the key for.
